text: @BreitbartNews Why do we need it? It’s based on what facts? Yes the Founding Fathers were white, males, and many owned slaves. Probably a few were gay. So what! But a play to re-engineer the truth? @EmeraldRobinson @RealJamesWoods @ksorbs @atensnut @dbongino @realDonaldTrump
